docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, April 11 (AP) -- The central cordillera of the Andes snapped into terrifying activity today and set its volcanoes to belching fire and ashes in a darkening mantle over panic-stricken cities.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, April 11 (AP) -- The central cordillera of the Andes snapped into terrifying activity today and set its volcanoes to belching fire and ashes in a darkening mantle over panic-stricken cities.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, April 11 (AP) -- Towns in Mendoza Province asked the Ministry of Interior tonight to rush drums of oxygen for the treatment of cases of asphyxiation from volcanic gas poured forth by erupting craters in the Andes.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, April 11 (AP) -- Towns in Mendoza Province asked the Ministry of Interior tonight to rush drums of oxygen for the treatment of cases of asphyxiation from volcanic gas poured forth by erupting craters in the Andes.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 12 -- Seven representative citizens who can contribute expert opinions as to the problems faced by American holders of defaulted foreign government bonds, in several instances holders of such bonds themselves, have been invited by...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 12 -- Seven representative citizens who can contribute expert opinions as to the problems faced by American holders of defaulted foreign government bonds, in several instances holders of such bonds themselves, have been invited by the State Department to a conference Friday to consider the advisability of organizing a bond-holders' protective association.
docs.abstract: On plan to form protective assn for foreign bondholders

headline.main: FAVORS COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN BONDS; State Department Invites Seven Experts to Conference Friday on Organizing. BANKERS ARE NOT ASKED Officials Have in Mind British Methods of Protecting Holders of Defaulted Issues.

docs.snippet: GENEVA, April 13 -- Ambassador Hugh S. Gibson's speech on Monday and Premier Andre Tardieu's reply yesterday have given form and substance to the disarmament conference that is meeting here. They have offered a choice between two methods and two...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, April 13 -- Ambassador Hugh S. Gibson's speech on Monday and Premier Andre Tardieu's reply yesterday have given form and substance to the disarmament conference that is meeting here. They have offered a choice between two methods and two objectives.
docs.abstract: Gibson and Tardieu plans divide conf

headline.main: GIBSON AND TARDIEU DIVIDE ARMS PARLEY; Italy, Brazil and Turkey Rally to Our Side, Poland, Uruguay and Yugoslavia to France's. JAPAN STANDS ON DRAFT Grandi Twits French Premier, Saying Paris Distinguished Offensive Arms Easily in Reich's Case. By P.J. PHILIP.

docs.snippet: Increases in gasoline prices were announced yesterday in various sections of the country, continuing the upward readjustment that was started recently after the advance in crude oil prices.
docs.lead_paragraph: Increases in gasoline prices were announced yesterday in various sections of the country, continuing the upward readjustment that was started recently after the advance in crude oil prices.

headline.main: PRICES OF GASOLINE FOLLOW RISE IN OIL; Standard of Indiana Adds 1 Cent a Gallon in All Parts of Its Territory. GENERAL ADVANCE IN WEST Upturn in Eastern Markets is Said to Be Under Consideration, With Action Probable Soon.

docs.snippet: GENEVA, April 18 (AP). -- Secretary of State Stimson, the victim of an annoying cold, remained in his sixteenth-century villa all today while the disarmament conference debated a proposal for reduction in arms to be achieved by successive stages.
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, April 18 (AP). -- Secretary of State Stimson, the victim of an annoying cold, remained in his sixteenth-century villa all today while the disarmament conference debated a proposal for reduction in arms to be achieved by successive stages.

docs.snippet: The Standard Oil Company of New Jersey has about concluded negotiations for the purchase of the foreign properties of the Pan-American Petroleum and Transport Company. The consideration, it is understood, will be both cash and stock and will amount...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Standard Oil Company of New Jersey has about concluded negotiations for the purchase of the foreign properties of the Pan-American Petroleum and Transport Company. The consideration, it is understood, will be both cash and stock and will amount to approximately $100,000,000.
docs.abstract: Negotiations almost concluded for purchase of foreign properties of Pan-Amer Petroleum & Transport Co

headline.main: OIL CONCERNS MAKE $100,000,000 SWITCH; Standard of New Jersey in Deal to Acquire Foreign Properties of Pan-American Petroleum. AVOIDANCE OF TARIFF SEEN Purchasing Company will Also Enhance Its Position in the World's Markets.

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, April 18. -- Citing the United States as an example of what a confederation of adjoining States signifies for their economic and political development, Emilio Tagle, a Chilean lawyer and politician, urges in a statement today the...
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, April 18. -- Citing the United States as an example of what a confederation of adjoining States signifies for their economic and political development, Emilio Tagle, a Chilean lawyer and politician, urges in a statement today the formation of a customs union for the southern section of South America.
docs.abstract: Urges customs union of Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay and Bolivia

headline.main: LATIN CUSTOMS UNION OF FIVE STATES URGED; Emilio Tagle, Santiago Lawyer, Outlines Plan for Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay and Bolivia.
